explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a hybrid methodology involving neural networks and fuzzy learning vector quantization, which are machine learning techniques.
explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper mentions the use of Kohonen unsupervised learning algorithm in the proposed model.
explanations.classification: The proposed model classifies S&P 500 stock market index options to detect regime shifts.
explanations.clustering: The paper uses fuzzy clustering algorithms as part of the proposed hybrid model.
explanations.neural network: The paper introduces a modular neural network as part of the MNN-FLVQ model for option pricing.
